NVD entry extractor from one XML file

A helper function for get_nvd_entries, uses XML::xmlEventParse.

get_nvd_from_file(file)

Arguments

file

An XML Version 2.0 file from https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/data-feeds#CVE_FEED

Value

A data.table containing NVD entries extracted from a file.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_nvd_from_file("nvdcve-2.0-2013.xml")
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
